methods.name: public void request(int senderWhat, Handler target, int targetWhat)
methods.comment:
*  Sign up for notifications about something.
     *
     *  When this broadcaster pushes a message with senderWhat in the what field,
     *  target will be sent a copy of that message with targetWhat in the what field.

methods.name: public void cancelRequest(int senderWhat, Handler target, int targetWhat)
methods.comment: * Unregister for notifications for this senderWhat/target/targetWhat tuple.

methods.name: public void dumpRegistrations()
methods.comment: * For debugging purposes, print the registrations to System.out

methods.name: public void broadcast(Message msg)
methods.comment:
* Send out msg.  Anyone who has registered via the request() method will be
     * sent the message.

methodNames: public void request(int senderWhat, Handler target, int targetWhat)
public void cancelRequest(int senderWhat, Handler target, int targetWhat)
